function.name: list_objects
function.description: List all game object names currently in the game state.

function.name: get_object_data
function.description: Retrieve the data for a specific game object by name.

object_name.description: The name of the game object to retrieve.

function.name: update_object_data
function.description: Update an existing game object's data using a dictionary of fields to change.

object_name.description: The name of the game object to update.

data.description: Valid json for the object data

function.name: remove_object
function.description: Remove a game object from the game state by name.

object_name.description: The name of the game object to remove.

function.name: add_object
function.description: Add a new game object to the game state with the specified name and data.

object_name.description: The name for the new game object.

data.description: Valid json for the object data
